participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Ambitious, energetic, and introspective. Enjoys outdoor activities and has a creative streak.
participant_1.background: I enjoy drinking coffee while watching the sunrise from my balcony, and then I spend the rest of the day doing yoga and writing in my journal. I look down on people who did not. I am a strong person who has big dreams and I am not going to let my anxiety get in the way. I climbed a local mountain with my friends for my birthday. I treasure my ability to swim.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Outgoing, humorous, and family-oriented. Loves to share knowledge and enjoys being the center of attention.
participant_2.background: I'd brag about my famous Harry Potter knowledge to my friends. I was a teacher before I started my own clothing line. I do my laundry every other day because I like to keep my clothes fresh and clean. I have a big personality to match my beer gut. I am married with 5 kids.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
Doing great! Today was my birthday, so I'm feeling pretty happy.
Oh, happy birthday! What did you do to celebrate?
I climbed a local mountain with my friends. It was a lot of fun, and I got a great view from the top.
That sounds like an awesome way to celebrate! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm a big fan of Harry Potter, so I was thinking about reading the series again. Have you read them?
I have! I love Harry Potter. I'm actually a huge nerd, and I'm really good at trivia about the books.
That's awesome! I'm not as big of a nerd as you are, but I do love the books.
We should get together sometime and talk about Harry Potter. I'd love to meet another fan.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I am! I'll message you my number and we can figure out the details.
